Getting Started with Real Estate API

Prerequisites

  • .NET 7.0 SDK
  • MongoDB 6.0
  • Visual Studio 2022 or VS Code

Setup

  1. Clone the repository:
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/real-estate-api.git
  1. Restore dependencies:
dotnet restore
  1. Update database connection in appsettings.json:
{
  "MongoDb": {
    "ConnectionString": "your_connection_string",
    "DatabaseName": "RealEstate"
  }
}
  1. Run the application:
dotnet run

Project Structure

RealEstate.API/
├── Controllers/     # API endpoints
├── Models/         # Data models
├── Services/       # Business logic
└── Data/          # Database context

Authentication

The API uses JWT for authentication. Include the token in requests:

Authorization: Bearer your_jwt_token

API Usage Examples

Register User

POST /api/auth/register
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "email": "user@example.com",
  "password": "password123",
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe"
}

Create Property

POST /api/properties
Content-Type: application/json
Authorization: Bearer your_jwt_token

{
  "title": "Beautiful House",
  "price": 250000,
  "location": "New York"
}
